DOC.brief_summary: Objective: To evaluate the feasibility and safety of a 4-6 weeks exercise - psycho-educational intervention in patients undergoing allogeneic stem cell transplantation (allo-HCST). The intervention included structured and supervised exercise, relaxation and psycho-educational components. It was hypothesized that the intervention would minimize loss of physical capacity during hospitalization.
DOC.brief_title: Multimodal Intervention in Allogeneic Stem Cell Transplantation
DOC.criteria: 1865 yrs patients undergoing allogeneic stem cell transplantation recent cardiovascular or pulmonary disease abnormal EKG psychiatric disorder motor function, musculoskeletal or neurological disturbances bony metastasis
DOC.keyword: Patients undergoing allogeneic stem cell transplantations
